videos.description: Charles Bassey gets the inbounds pass and finishes over Hameir Wright, earning his way to the free throw line for a chance at a three-point play.
videos.headline: WKY's Bassey jams for and-1

videos.description: David Crisp sends one towards the rim, and Nahziah Carter skies to put it down with two hands.
videos.headline: Crisp lobs to Carter for alley-oop flush

videos.description: Taveion Hollingsworth launches a pass down court to Marek Nelson, who finishes with a reverse for two plus the foul.
videos.headline: WKY's Nelson finishes full-court pass for and-1

videos.description: Jaylen Nowell grabs the loose ball and finds David Crisp in transition, who drains a 3 to give the Huskies a 37-36 lead over the Hilltoppers.
videos.headline: Crisp's transition 3 gives Huskies lead

videos.description: Taveion Hollingsworth whips a pass down low, and Charles Bassey gathers for the rim-rocking finish.
videos.headline: Hollingsworth threads needle for WKY dunk

videos.description: David Crisp takes Jake Ohmer off the dribble, draining a pull-up jump shot to give the Huskies a 50-48 lead.
videos.headline: Crisp crosses up Ohmer for pull-up jumper

videos.description: Noah Dickerson misses his first attempt on the inside, but stays with the play and winds up slamming down a thunderous jam to make it 58-50 Huskies.
videos.headline: Dickerson gets own miss for 2-handed slam
